description: ff. 64. 203 x 140; 145 x 83 mm. 21 lin. Maghribi. Shawwāl 1075. Urjūzah on al-ashbāh wa-al-naẓāʼir: Baghdādī, Īḍāḥ al-maknūn, II. 732; Fihris al-kutub al-mawjūdah bi-al-Maktabah al-Azharīyah, II. 420. Incip.: قال على وهو ذو اقصارى * ابن عبىد الواحد الاناصرى The author describes the purpose of his work as follows (fol. 2a, lin. 5-6): هذا وان لى حبىبا ىرغب * نظم نظاىر حواها المذهب فى رجز مهذب الفصول * مأس الفروع بالاصول
author: Sijilmāsī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAbd al-Wāḥid, d. 1674

title.@value: al-Yawāqīt al-thamīnah fīmā intamá li-ālim al-Madīnah

subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
